Ju3y 28, 1959
Mr. Thomas E. Carakadon
Associate Director
The Twentieth Century Fund
Ul East 70th Street
Mew York 21, Mew York
Dear Tom*
I m taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming
NAEB network offering. I thought you might be interested in what
the nation*s educational radio network is doing. I also thought
you might have particular interest in the programs listed on
pages 9, 10, 13, 1U, 19, 20, 23, 39, Ul, UU, U$, $2, and 53.
Sincerely,
HJStJO
Harry J. Skornla
Executive Director
